mapper.sql: Collector_Person_ID, Site_ID, Collector_Name, User_Name, `Password`, Phone, IDcard_Number, Photo, User_Status
mapper.select: select c.Collector_Person_ID,c.Site_ID,c.Collector_Name,c.User_Name,c.Phone,r.Site_Name from collector c left join recycle_site r on c.Site_ID=r.Site_ID where Collector_Person_ID = #{collectorPersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select c.Collector_Person_ID,c.Collector_Name,c.User_Name,c.IDcard_Number,c.Phone,c.User_Status,r.Site_Name from collector c left join recycle_site r on c.Site_ID=r.Site_ID
select Collector_Person_ID from collector where Site_ID=#{siteid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into collector (Site_ID, Collector_Name, User_Name, `Password`, Phone, IDcard_Number, Photo, User_Status) values (#{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update collector
Site_ID = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Collector_Name = #{collectorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
User_Name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`Password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDcard_Number = #{idcardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
User_Status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Collector_Person_ID = #{collectorPersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update collector set Site_ID = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Collector_Name = #{collectorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, User_Name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `Password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDcard_Number = #{idcardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, User_Status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Collector_Person_ID = #{collectorPersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
